sections.heading: support; withholding of earnings; court; powers
sections.text: In any proceeding when a district court, county court, or separate juvenile court has ordered, temporarily or permanently, a parent, referred to as parent-employee in sections 42-364.01 to 42-364.12, to pay any amount for the support of a minor child,

sections.heading: 42-364.01 to 42-364.12 amend section 25-1588, R
sections.text: R.S.1943, insofar as it contains no limitations on garnishment of disposable earnings in aid of an order for support of a person, and is inconsistent with the provisions of these sections. Ferry v. Ferry, 201 Neb. 595, 271 N.W.2d 450 (1978).
